
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

int t,n,m;
unsigned int sum;

int main()
{
cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>n;
	if(n==1)
	cout<<"0"<<endl;
	else
	{
	sum=1;
	int i=2;
        m=sqrt(n);
		while(i<=m)
		{
 		  if(n%i==0)
		 { sum=sum+i+(n/i);}
			i++;
		 }
 		if(n/m==m&&n%m==0)
		{sum=sum-m;}
	  cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	}
return 0;
}
